In the 16th and 17th centuries, the fortress-city of Fasil Ghebbi was the residence of the Ethiopian emperor Fasilides and his successors. Surrounded by a 900-m-long wall, the city contains palaces, churches, monasteries and unique public and private buildings marked by Hindu and Arab influences, subsequently transformed by the Baroque style brought to Gondar by the Jesuit missionaries.

Tiya is among the most important of the roughly 160 archaeological sites discovered so far in the Soddo region, south of Addis Ababa. The site contains 36 monuments, including 32 carved stelae covered with symbols, most of which are difficult to decipher. They are the remains of an ancient Ethiopian culture whose age has not yet been precisely determined.

The ruins of the ancient city of Aksum are found close to Ethiopia\'s northern border. They mark the location of the heart of ancient Ethiopia, when the Kingdom of Aksum was the most powerful state between the Eastern Roman Empire and Persia.

Bringing a grilling revolution to Addis. We are set on freshness, our burger meat is ground on-site and our buns are baked in-house every day.

Chicken Hut provides a wide variety of crunchy, delicious fried chicken foods with a quality and freshness that sets a new standard in the quick service segment.

Welcome to Sheraton Addis Hotel located in the centre of Addis Ababa near the National Museums, United Nations Conference Centre, the UNECA headquarters, the Merkato and Bole International Airport (7km). The hotel is a sanctuary of Ethiopian grandeur, where a landscape of vibrant greens and colourful wildflowers meets the African sky.
One of the best hotels found in Ethiopia with great service from the staff working there.

Hilton Addis Ababa is the preferred venue for meetings and exhibitions; with years of experience and outside catering options, our specialists have the skill to make your event a success.Relax in our urban retreat, popular with the trendy and famous. Escape the noise of the city and unwind with leisure facilities including geothermal swimming pool, tennis court, putting green and private park. Discover the culture and history of Addis Ababa, a vibrantly alive landscape of dramatic beauty.
The Hilton may not be newest hotel in Addis but it truly has charm and character that many of the new hotels can not offer. I highly recommend staying at the Hilton Addis.

Ethiopian Skylight Hotel is located at the heart of Addis Ababa, just five minutes away from Addis Ababa Bole International Airport. Meeting international standards with outstanding quality of service, Africaâ€™s commercial hub awaits you.

A very convenient place to stay. It has all the amenities Skylight is known for and more. Only a short distance from the airport. The pool side restaurant was very relaxing. The staff was very hospitable.
